website_summaries.verdict: The TCL LEFHDE3000 series is a no-frills LED backlit HDTV line that delivers a bright picture and sharp image quality at under $360 for 40 inches.

customer_reviews.title: A good t.v. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: My TCL television is several years old. I recently had a problem with getting the t.v. channels to show. I phoned customer service and they walked me through a solution. We had to do a work-around, because my remote control was acting glitchy. Anyway, the tech that helped me was infinitely patient. (With no trace of irony, she told me that her name is "Nice".) I just wanted to acknowledge the great customer service I received, at no charge, on an older tv with no extended warranty. Great job, TCL!
customer_reviews.author: mrey

customer_reviews.title: not so hot--i need to retract
customer_reviews.text: the tv has a serious delay when coming on, remarkable ten to twelve seconds before the picture starts up, almost like an old transsister tv. I called but they blamed it on the cable company, I have two toshiba tvs in the same house that do nto have the same issue. Nice price but really you get what you pay for, should have stuck with Samsung. Since writing this review I have come to find out the delay is not the television but the local cable company, we all know working with cable is a mistake. So thank you Comncast fo rthe delay. TV is doing well. better sound than expected, very good picture. I am satisfied with the value
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother. Her old TV was going out and we wanted to get her something more modern. She has had it for over a month and literally never turns it off. (She sleeps with it on) The TV has been great and she has had no issues. The shipment was right on time and everything was there. Normally, when it comes to items like TVs we purchase from a store just for the "see what you are getting" peace of mind. This is the first TV I have purchased online and was very pleased with the results. I would buy this one again if the need for a TV arises again.
customer_reviews.author: BSE

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little worried at first because I have never heard of TCL, but I'm glad I made this decision. I own plenty of familiar brand name products but that certainly doesn't make them perfect. Bottom line, the TCL was affordable and is a wonderful TV. Easy setup, great picture and well worth it. On a side note, if you are using a TV mount I found the instructions to be a bit limited. The manual says that 400 x 400 M6 screws are required but it makes no mention of length/depth. My online research yielded no help either. I later found out that 25 MM depth is the correct size for the M6 screws with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great product & price.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on the volume. So this has transitioned from my living room to my bedroom. Perfect for it. The volume issue wasn't a big deal. You can make adjustments and also add sound enhancements if you just like it Mega LOUD! I'm extremely very happy with the product and price. I see this brand growing also, it's even in Sams Club. They don't sell cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Cash

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Colors.
customer_reviews.text: The colors on this TV are INCREDIBLE! The blacks are deep, and colors bright and true right out of the box for me. It's got a solid build, but still light, and mounting it was a really simple procedure. It's got a ton of hookups for devices, and the 40 inch screen is great for medium to large rooms. I can't speak to the sound quality because I hooked it to a sound bar, but overall it's a fantastic TV for it's price range... I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a good 40 inch on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Moonstruckgrl

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: After not having a television in the home for a few years, I decided to purchase one so my guy could watch football and hockey games, and so we could watch martial arts films without difficulty in reading the subtitles. The TV is great. Hooked up speakers and HDMI (for my laptop/Netflix, Hulu, etc). It's not fancy with 3D or internet-ready, but it has all the inputs we needed, the picture is good, remote works well, and I can watch through my computer, a blue-ray player or cable. Great buy for the money, and it was well-packaged.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Great, Simple TV
customer_reviews.text: We just wanted a simple and smaller flat screen for the bedroom. This has been a great addition. It has decent sound and works great with our Blu Ray player that features Netflix and Amazon Prime. Light weight and mounted easily on a mount we purchased (Cheetah Mounts APTMSB). I ended up recommending this inexpensive TV to use in an office foyer at work. We rotate slideshows made from PowerPoint and exported to JPG files that are loaded on the USB port. I have no complaints and have considered getting one of the larger ones for the main living room.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Crye

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, low price, what not to like.
customer_reviews.text: I had read previous raves about the picture quality but one has to see it to believe it. I have two Samsung plasma large screens and the tcl takes the cake. I bought this for our master bedroom and since setting it up, we have spent a lot more time in the bed. Wife and I tend to fight over the bedroom set even when the DVD is in the den. And the price is great compared to its peers.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Still a good deal, a year later, and working perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Even almost a full year after I purchased this TV, it is still a good deal! Great picture, low power usage, intuitive design, no unnecessary bells and whistles - just sharp picture on a big screen for a low price. I'm even using it now as I type this, because I use a cable DV to HDMI cable to turn my 13" laptop into a 40" desktop! Good times. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kerekes

customer_reviews.title: Great deal with amazing Video , CLEAR Crisp VIVID!!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is for my Spa in my backyard so its close to the water. Its been through rain, wind and hot hot sunny days and cold nights with the spa blazing on. This TV rockS!!! the picture quality is amazing. I get more compliments from this "cheaper" TV than my main one in my living room. Clear crisp and VIVID. Easy to set up and just amazing over all with more than enough HDMI capes and a USB port as well. Great deal at a steal !!
customer_reviews.author: So cali girl

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: I carefully studied the reviews....and found them to be helpful. The TV arrived without a scratch and it has worked well. The color is wonderful and the sound is nice. I have recommended this product to others who need a quality TV at a reasonable price. I will also replace other TV's with the TCL product when needed.
customer_reviews.author: A. O. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best. Value. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a $2000 unit, but you knew that. That said, it's extremely impressive for the price. Honestly, if you put a Samsung logo on it I bet more than half of Samsung buyers wouldn't know the difference. Screen is very bright (glare is still a bit of an issue for me, but it faces a very huge sunny window so I think it'd be an issue with most TVs), the stand is very sleek and expensive looking (black glass, not a cheap piece of plastic). I've never used the built-in speakers so I can't comment on that, but otherwise it's fantastic. Could have paid $200 more and still been happy.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great HDTV at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd TCL HDTV. I had ordered the 40" version of this TV a month or so prior and both are beyond my expectations. They come with a 2 year warranty where other top name TV's only give a one year. They stand behind their product!! You can't get a better TV for the price I paid ($185 for the 32" and $278 for the 40") I would definitely recommend this to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is our second TCL tv. Our first was a 32 inch and that's now on the wall in the bedroom. The quality is really good, i have no complaints at all about these tvs. they are alot cheaper and work just as well as the pricier ones. we have had the 32 inch one for probably about 6 years now, so they seem to last.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great. Good color quality and refresh rate
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great. Good color quality and refresh rate. The housing, menu interface, and delay from power off is really poor. If it were not for the really low price tag I probably would recommend passing. I definitely would not recommend if you change inputs frequently or as a primary display.
customer_reviews.author: smtelegadis

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv/price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a small bedroom. Works as advertised. Sound is OK for small room, and picture is excellent. I've fed it Dish 1080i and 720p, see no difference at this screen size. I have 7 other tvs from 27" to 55", all others are 1080i/p screens. This is just as good at 720P, so save a little money.
customer_reviews.author: Teamw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This TV has proven to be an excellent value. It was delivered faster than expected, and has a vibrant screen and easy to configure for accessories such as Xbox, DVD and STB. The quality is as expected, and this replaced a 52 inch projection TV and the picture quality is vastly superior. A good TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Barton

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to purchase this TV especially at the lower price. The only problems I have found with it is the blurring during quick movements i.e. football and some TV series. I had read some of the reviews before purchasing and they mentioned this problem but I did not think it would be enough to be annoying. It is getting more so now. The sound is another problem as I seem to have to constantly adjust the sound during some programs (either performers are mumbling or audio drops down for some reason). Also helpful would be some type of manual availability. I had to call an installer to set up my TV for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This TV comes with its base unattached. I cannot get the screws provided to screw in. First, I went to the recommended web site which came up total blank. So I telephoned Customer Service where I was required to provide voluminous documentation. Finally, they (I talked to two of them) promised to send the right screws within a few days. How did I know they were lying? The screws have never come now weeks later. I have the base attached as tightly as I can. Wobbly. I hold my breath lest it topple over and break.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Cox

customer_reviews.title: tcl to top
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 40 inch. picture quality is great. We mounted ours on the wall in family room. The only thing I can say that is not positive is we cant find the code to program the tv to direct tv. Otherwise this will probably be a big selling brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: tuck

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: TV looks awesome and for that price it can not be beat. No complaints what so ever. Great TV. Purchased it based on review on Amazon and price. The only slight downside is that it does not play video files from USB, just music and picture files. No big deal though. Just be aware in case you plan on using it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV for a awesome price
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews and not being able to find a really bad one i decided to jump on this TV. I made the right choice. The picture is crystal clear, the sound is fine, not one problem with anything that i do with this tv. I have my PC hooked up to it iwth HDMI, a Western Digital Live hooked up with HDMI, and a DVD with RCA jacks, plenty of room for more connections too. Everything about the TV is great, and the price makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McFerren

customer_reviews.title: TCL
customer_reviews.text: This is the third TCL flat screen we have ordered and we find the picture on all to be great, the screen size is perfect for the size of the rooms we use these TVs in. From watching local broadcasts to movies we are very satisfied. We found them easy to set up with our network and other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: MaryE

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Have to say I've been pleasantly surprised with this tv. Only had it a week so don't have a clue about durability. That said, the image is crisp, the colors dynamic. In fact, a little too vivid; I lowered the color intensity a bit and it looks good. As others have said, the sound is mediocre, but what can you expect? I hooked mine up to my sound system easily. What else? Very light-weight and an overall good-looking tv, in terms of design. Happy right now -- let's see how TCL ("the creative life," I kinda dig that slogan) pans out down the road. If it's not durable, I'll check in.
customer_reviews.author: Mark CS

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV a couple months ago as a display for my AppleTV where I can hook up my laptop and have a second display. I bought it for $275 before the price went up. After a little research I was happy to buy this TV over the others, it was hard to find another 40 inch TV at that price. I don't know if this is accurate but I read somewhere that TLC uses the same displays as in Samsung TVs. Supposedly TLC is very popular in China
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: i'm happy with the product. it's a great value for the price. i've owned a samsung lcd years ago. Perhaps my eyes aren't too sensitive, but both products seem clear to me. I never tried comparing another tv side by side, but heck, for the price, i don't think you can complain!
customer_reviews.author: L. LE

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for use in a bedroom for a very inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV because I need a little bit bigger TV in my bedroom, this TV is definitely not for people who are looking for top notch quality, but for the price you pay it works perfect. My only thing I had a problem with was the stand you had to attach. Either the holes were drilled wrong, or they were just ridiculously hard to get the screws in correctly. I almost feel like I will never be able to detach it (even though I probably wont). All in all, it is a great TV if you want a quality TV for the price you are going to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler H

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Static contrast ratio could be better, dynamic is not everything. I am using it as a computer display so some of the text is a little blurred, more than a 2009 Bravia I had purchased previously. However, for the price I cannot complain, the colors are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pettett

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought the picture was going to be inferior because this is not one of the big named TVs. I was wrong, nice picture, sound is fair. I used RCA codes for my Comcast remote. Works great. You can't go wrong for the price of this TV compared to other LED 1080P 120Hz.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Fergus

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't expecting much but...
customer_reviews.text: ... this TV has so far exceed my expectations. The picture quality is great and although the sound is nothing to scream about it is adequate. Adding a separate sound source is the way to go. I actually used this as a computer monitor to edit video and it looks great. Overall I am happy with this and the 2 year warranty is a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mancel A. Nunis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a good digital TV that would fit into a small entertainment center, and this just fit perfect with little space to spare. Good sound and color, easy to set up, and the HD picture is amazing. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really nice TV
customer_reviews.text: I had this TV since November and I must say I am really impressed with this TV. I read every review posted on Amazon to make my decision, and it was well worth it. I am a very happy camper HD movies in 1080p on this thing is a blast could not ask for anything more. Just get the picture quality right and your good to go. People have been complaining about the stand but it is very easy to set up no problems but the metal piece must be placed correctly or it would not line up. this thing made my Christmas even better. Buy this TV you would not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: narutoichgo1122

customer_reviews.title: GREAT item for the price
customer_reviews.text: GREAT item for the price. Put it in the basement (at this price I don't care if it is ruined by a flood) and now the kids can go downstairs to play their video games. No more fights over the main TV.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Even better price! I used this in my office conference room. I bought a kit for $30.00 to hang on the wall. It is very very lightweight, lightest TV I've ever seen. So it hung easily .
customer_reviews.author: I HEART AMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Good TV , great price but came with a defect
customer_reviews.text: The TV has good picture specially with HD movies the sound is ok and unbeatable price , but unfortunately a thin black vertical line appeared in the middle of the screen few days later, in addition to the screws of the base seem lager than the holes it took forever to fix them , I was so disappointed but i'm glad return policy to amazon is so easy they sent me online a label to ship it back without paying any fees , I received my money back next day of shipping
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Y. Elarabi

customer_reviews.title: solid buy!
customer_reviews.text: great TV for the price! i can't complain. i have had this tv for about 3 months looks just as good as my samsung. the light around the corners is just a bit brighter than the rest of the tv, but i can tell unless the screen is black, or very dark.
customer_reviews.author: White hearth

customer_reviews.title: Good TV so far.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the best TV on the market but it is fine for my use. I use it to monitor 8 cameras i have installed around my home. The picture is OK but I needed to adjust it as it looked washed out as it came out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this tv very much.Color,vivid 1080 HD.I read the reviews and they were correct on the poor sound(I have bad hearing)no problem though,I hooked it up to my audio receiver and it is great.The price was fantastic for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Rudenauer Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is very good.. And the price was inexpensive compared to other tv's..it does just have one set of red,green,yellow connections but that has been no problem.. I would certainly recommend and purchase again..arrived on time..
customer_reviews.author: sunnysett

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd TCL TV I've purchased. I'm as happy or more so with this second purchase. The TV hooked up quick and easy, and the picture is great!! I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: i bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best inexpensive tv out there. I bought a first at 399 on sale and loved it so much i bought a second at 499 when they raised the price. it was still the best deal out there. the sound isnt the greatest, however this is an amazing deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: joe teague

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: I got this TV for my mom on Christmas, and she and my sisters have enjoyed it ever since! Great size + quality for a really great price. Works perfectly with everything we've used on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV for our guest bedroom. What a great buy, great picture and sound. Very easy to tune and put together, highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TEM

customer_reviews.title: For the price, best in class
customer_reviews.text: I spent 300 and some change to the door with tax and next day shipping. I challenge you to find another TV in this class and size for that kind of price! Very happy with the picture and performance....I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: have to use two remotes
customer_reviews.text: The TV works just fine. The only reason for not giving it 5 stars is because it is not listed in any of the remote control models so you cannot change the volume or turn it on or off without using two different remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: TV looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV to replace my vizio 42"plasma. I am well pleased and have had no problems. The picture quality is great and the sound is okay. I have surround sound so I never use the television speakers. Great buy for the price for sure. The only issue I had was finding the remote code for my Dish remote. It was 742 for anyone needing it. I would by this set again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.  It works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV because it was light. I'm a small person and I like being independent! I like the fact that I can carry/ move it whenever I feel like it. Good sound. Good picture. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Shin-eh J. Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: The screws for the stand were too large
customer_reviews.text: I just got the TV yestarday and the screws for the stand were too large and would not screw in , I called TCL they have excellent customer service and gave me the correct size of screws to order in case i want to get my own . The TV is great i like the picture and sound
customer_reviews.author: Nivedita Sharme

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it really can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: When the screen is all black I can see a grey butterfly type pattern across the whole screen. Basically when I am not watching something, is when I can see this. Picture quality is good. I would recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: A good TV for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a good picture, is very light in weight and was very easy to set up. I gave it only four stars because the speakers do not sound good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schmertman

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This TV works great! It was the best deal I could find and doesn't come with the smart-TV gimmicky stuff. (You can easily use an HDMI cable and hook it up to your computer!)
customer_reviews.author: Dude.

customer_reviews.title: I love this TV
customer_reviews.text: This is the first flat screen TV I've ever bought. I was a little nervous because I'd never heard of TCL before, but my friends assured me they were an okay company. So far I like everything about this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Very nice..
customer_reviews.text: Use this in a large office as a way to share PC screens with others. Note that the VGA port does not support full HD (as stated in the spec's) - we used HDMI from the computer and it works for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We are really pleased with this tv. It is well worth the money and seems to be of excellent quality. We have not had any trouble with it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny U

customer_reviews.title: TCL 50 inch LED
customer_reviews.text: The price and quality of this TCL 50-inch LED TV made for the perfect combination when considering a replacement TV. The LED emits almost NO heat and consumes little electricity. LED and TCL are a great mix!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well
customer_reviews.text: I got this TV for my son's playroom and it is working out like a charm so far. We got it under $200 at the time and for a playroom 720p was more than enough. W have it connected to a Chrome cast so we stream to it whenever we are in the room without having to connect cables. An excellent TV for a excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Alphanso Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this tv! it has a beautiful resolution...totally clear! i do warranty work for many brands of TVs and this one is very high quality!! You will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: MARK W.

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd TCL TV - for a good reason
customer_reviews.text: I had to move at the end of last year and sold the initial TCL TV that I have purchased... as I was entirely happy with the first purchase I had no hesitation about going again for a TCL TV- this option is about $200 cheaper than other more well known brands and does everything that you would expect from a traditional TV with a great HD picture and adequate sound.. A Happy repeat customer...
customer_reviews.author: Gerard D

customer_reviews.title: nice and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: really good for the price - I got those to use as computer monitors and they work out well. The refresh rate is not the best for a computer but it works for my work.
customer_reviews.author: Malek Muraywed

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and simple
customer_reviews.text: Fit the bill for an inexpensive TV. It was well packaged and shipped quickly. The picture won't amaze you, but isn't bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Byttorr

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: TV stopped working after 1.5 years. Now it just takes up space in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Figallo

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and very good value
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old $1500 MAGNAVOX LCD TV died but which is not used much. This TV has excellent resolution and much lighter. A great value when it is $500.
customer_reviews.author: Gu2High

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This tv was a bargain. I looked at several tvs in all the stores and this at amazon. great picture and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: For that price... great TV
customer_reviews.text: For this price this has to be the best TV you can get. It has a good picture and is very bright and clear. Remote is pretty bare bones, but whatever.
customer_reviews.author: h2otaco

customer_reviews.title: Item as described!
customer_reviews.text: The TV is working great! I received in perfect order. The only problem the off brand my cable remote will not pick up control code for this TV. Over all good buy.
customer_reviews.author: pattyflyingbear

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money and very good video quality
customer_reviews.text: have bought about 4 of them. and no issues. well worth the money and very good video quality. no issues with them
customer_reviews.author: Huntingdon

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: We've had this tv for over a year now and it's been great. Also has the best warranty of any tv(at least when we bought this one it did).
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I love this TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 32-inch HDTV after a long search for a good and low price TV. , it is very easy to install and use , amazing picture and sound, I had no problems at all .It is worth the money I paid for it. I highly recommend this TV for anyone who looks for a good quality and affordable price TV.
customer_reviews.author: Huda

customer_reviews.title: Widescreen
customer_reviews.text: We love our new TV. Great picture. Easy to set up and control. We had never heard of this brand, but we are perfectly happy with it. We have it on DISH HD.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J. Switzer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Use as video monitor. Crisp picture with excellent detail. No issues so far. Highly recommend to others at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Deux

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, perfect for my space.
customer_reviews.text: The television is very light weight and I did not have to adjust the color, tint, anything right out of the box. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Coleen Karten

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: It has been said a billion times in other reviews, but I'll just reiterate in order to explain the 4 starts instead of 5. The stand is crap. I had to cut the saws down to size to make it fit properly. A pain in the neck, but at least the tv itself works perfectly well. If the screws came in the right size, it would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: lckr1991

customer_reviews.title: TCL 32-inch
customer_reviews.text: This HDTV is perfect for my children's room. Easy setup and operation. We all enjoy the picture quality while watching movies and playing video games.
customer_reviews.author: GARY A NEAL

customer_reviews.title: 2 Months After Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Little history is that my last TV (a 47 inch Sharp) was stolen while I was away on vacation and I was looking for a new TV. I had never heard of TCL before so I did a little (not a lot) of research and discovered they were making parts for Samsung TV's before striking out on their own. That gave me some comfort. I did not desire or need a smart TV due to the fact that I have all the same abilities through my bluray player so this 50 inch TV at $500 (when I bought it) has turned out to be an amazing deal. I've even recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.author: M. Muggli

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This China built television looks great and for the low price was a good value. I would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: JRV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV and good price
customer_reviews.text: First shipment dammage...second ok...TV picture is great with many compliments from friends...sound is ok..best if you have your sound system.

customer_reviews.title: great tv.
customer_reviews.text: got for a fifth tv, works great.i also use for a computer moniter,and the kids love it to play games on.
customer_reviews.author: coop57

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical as I have never heard of this TLC brand and not sure who makes this product. However, all my high expections were met, delivery was fast and I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: zeva

customer_reviews.title: good tv great price
customer_reviews.text: Its a Good TV for a great price! At first the TV came with factory setting of color and contrast and every thing was just bursting out of screen. I personalized it be putting the color settings a few notches down and it was fine.. I had a sony then replaced my vizio for this. Unlike vizio this is having very bright contrasting colors. Controls are a little different. The only thing I miss from my old TV is auto switch off power saving, this has sleep timer but was used to old TV. Sound is good compared to vizio. like i said .. its a good tv not great but good..
customer_reviews.author: Div

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: This tv was bought for my nephew, he loves it. The picture is great and the color is excellent. The price can't be beat for this hd tv
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2. Can't beat it for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2. Can't beat it for the price I paid ... !!!
customer_reviews.author: bobonit469

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Good Tv, could use some surround sound if you are hard of hearing. Good picture, great quality for the great low price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I would have boughten one bigger if I knew it would fit into my cabinet. Might give this one to mom and upgrade to a larger screen. Took minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D

customer_reviews.title: I Love This TV
customer_reviews.text: This is my first LED TV and I just love it. The picture is vibrant; the sound is bold. I'm very happy with it and recommend it wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Review of TCL TV
customer_reviews.text: This is the second TCL TV we purchased. We're VERY happy with all aspects of it - sound, picture quality, ease of use. It's a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Rooney

customer_reviews.title: perfect tv-good price
customer_reviews.text: perfect tv-good price Like the image quality and sound. Works very well with Xbox one . Recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Good picture overall
customer_reviews.text: It had good pictures overall. But it did have some picture auto syn. detection issues with my PlayStation 3 HDMI output to TV. Once it auto detect with right frq. picture look very good. in order to auto detect HDMI with Playsation 3 we had to turn TV on/off till it syn correctly. Price is right.

customer_reviews.title: tcl tv
customer_reviews.text: we have this tv in our backroom the sound and quality are excellent - very nice buy and would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Ok tv
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice TV but the color quality is way off. I wish I would have paid a little more for a better tv.
customer_reviews.author: ang_irv

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the pirce
customer_reviews.text: TV worked great, had crisp image and sound quality I really can't complain about. Only down side is only half of the screws that came with it fit the stand. Sadly my 5 year old broke the TV by throwing a wooden block at it. Will probably be buying another one at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: TV HAS A FEW PROBLEMS...ONE WAS THE SCREWS TO THE STAND DID NOT FIT AND THERE IS NO AV(AUDIO-VIDEO) FORMAT TO PUT YOUR DVD/VCR PLAYER TO.HAD TO USE THE CMPT(COMPONENT) FORMAT.THE CMPT PLAYS DVDs BUT WILL NOT ADAPT TO PLAY VCR TAPES.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great Price point for this TV and picture is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Great Price point for this TV and picture is excellent. Am using it in a rental and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: RayZar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good
customer_reviews.text: Everything works very well and quality is pretty good too. Can't complain for the price. I am using this TV with google's chromecast device. I do like the USB port on the back of the tv as it keeps the chromecast charged all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This TV is great. It has a really quality picture. I stream a bunch of stuff on Apple TV and watch local channels on using an HD antenna. The picture is great. The speakers are not great, but I just bought a soundbar and am now really pleased with what I have. Considering the price, this is an awesome TV.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys W Warburton

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this tv is great, its not as crisp and vibrant as a the other higher end TV's but its still a very much enjoyable experience watching it
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Francois

customer_reviews.title: Review of the TLC LE50HDE3010 50-inch TV
customer_reviews.text: This television has met my every expectations. The picture is 1080p quality and sound is excellent. I would definitely recommend this TV to anyone who is interested in a high quality presentation at a price that cannot be beat.

customer_reviews.title: TLC for 199 great
customer_reviews.text: its cool no problems so far and i would say its great considering the price i got it for i definitely recommend it

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: All you need is and hdmi cable and a sound bar and your set great picture, color and great price.

product_meta.title: TCL LE40FHDE3000 40-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
product_meta.description:
TCL LE40FHDE3000 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV with 2-Year Warranty. Enjoy a big screen viewing experience with the TCL 40-Inch 1080p 60-Hz Direct-lit LED HDTV. This back-lit LED television offers 1080p high-definition picture quality, lots of connections with a picture that delivers incredible contrast and vibrancy. Whether you're hosting movie night, cheering on a favorite team, or sharing your latest vacation photos on the USB connection, you'll love how this high-definition LED television brings your media to life.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


THE CREATIVE LIFE
Welcome to The Creative Life Allow us to introduce ourselves. We're TCL, The Creative Life. We're one of the three largest television manufacturers in the world, selling premium consumer electronics in over 130 countries across 6 continents. And we've been making high quality CRT, plasma and LCD televisions for over three decades. In fact, we probably made many of the components in your old TV, so even though we may have never officially met, chances are, we've been in your home for years. So, it's nice to meet you. Again.

THE ULTIMATE VIEWING EXPERIENCE
Enjoy The Creative Life with the TCL 40" 1080p back-lit LED HDTV. It delivers premium picture quality and tremendous value in a sophisticated slim frame design perfect for bringing entertainment to any space. This flat screen LED HDTV features Full High Definition 1080p resolution, a dynamic contrast ratio of 3,500,000:1, two HDMI inputs, TCL True Color, providing a broadened color spectrum for more natural color, TCL Smart Volume, for level sound when surfing channels and during commercials while meeting ENERGY STAR 6.0 Guidelines. Color Your World with affordable technology backed by an industry-leading 2 year limited manufacturer’s warranty.

MODERN, EFFICIENT DESIGN
Fit more picture into less space with Thin Frame design. ULTRA-THIN BEZEL
The thin frame design of TCL's E3000 Series TVs gives it high-end appearance without the high-end price. Thin frames maximize the big screen experience, by letting you fit more screen into less space. And images seem bigger without the frame getting in the way.

SAVE MONEY, ENERGY AND THE ENVIRONMENT
TCL E3000 Series LED TVs are Energy Star 6.0 compliant. That means they not only meet energy efficiency standards established by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency but they save you money. And all TCL LED TVs are both lead and mercury free. Which means TCL LED TVs help consumers save money--and the environment--by efficiently using energy, reducing greenhouse gas emissions and keeping harmful pollutants out of landfills.

GET CONNECTED
The TCL E3000 comes loaded with all the inputs you'll need to get connected. The two HDMI inputs support copy-protected HD broadcast content and provide an uncompressed, all-digital audio/video link for the highest quality connection.

The E3000 Series also has two audio output connections to maximize audio connectivity, one for headphones and a second digital audio coax output for connection to your home theater receiver or other audio device. Other inputs include two HDMI ports, composite video, component video, a USB 2.0 port and PC audio and video for easy connection to the latest Blu-ray or DVD players, sound systems, camcorders, and game consoles.

The PC inputs let you stream your computer's digital media to the big screen, while the USB port allows for quick connection of a digital camera or other USB device.

PERFORMANCE AND QUALITY
ENHANCED PICTURE AND SOUND
You'll enjoy crisp, vibrant images thanks to dynamic LED backlighting. The TCL E3000 Series automatically adjusts the LED backlighting based on what you're watching so you'll see perfect edge and shadow detail during dark screens and vivid, colorful pictures during bright scenes. Dynamic LED backlighting is the difference between a good picture and a great picture.

And to complete the fully immersive experience, the E3000 provides surround sound with Dolby Digital processing through two built-in 4-watt speakers. And the 176-degree viewing angles ensure optimum enjoyment from multiple vantage points--a great feature for large spaces or social gatherings.

ON-SCREEN ADJUSTMENTS WITH CLICK OF A BUTTON
Want to change the picture and sound settings to suit your personal preferences? It's easy with the on-screen user interface that is controlled with the remote control. Select customized presets or change individual sound and picture attributes with the click of a button.

Advanced Video Modes let you adjust the TV for the best possible picture depending on what your watching and the specific lighting environment. With Vibrant, Cinerama and Sports modes you'll always get the most from your TCL LED TV. Select Vibrant mode for daytime viewing in sunlit conditions, Cinerama mode for a true home theater experience or Sports mode for the big game or fast pace gaming action from you PC or gaming console.

BACKED BY A 2-YEAR WARRANTY
Not all TV brands have the confidence to stand behind their products with a 2 year warranty. But TCL believes you should get piece of mind with a new TV purchase. That's why TCL E3000 Series LED HDTVs are backed by an industry leading two-year manufacturer's limited warranty.

2013 TCL MODEL COMPARISON
Series E3000 E3000 E3010 E3010 F3310TA E5510 E5510 Screen Size 32" 40" 50" 58" 32", 48", 55" 40" 50", 55" Resolution 720p 1080p 1080p 1080p 1080p 1080p 1080p Backlight Technology Direct LED Direct LED Edge LED Direct LED Direct LED Edge LED Edge LED Dynamic Backlight Refresh Rate 60Hz 60Hz 120Hz CMI 120Hz CMI 120Hz CMI 120Hz CMI 120Hz CMI Energy Star 6.0 Thin Frame Design Elegant Glass Base HDMI/USB 2/1 2/1 3/1 3/1 3/1 4/1 4/1 Dolby Processing Sound Equalizer SRS TruSurroundHD Channel Labeling PC Connectivity Sleep Timer Alarm (Wake Up Timer) TCL Smart TV Built-In Wi-Fi
